# `close` : Is a value close to another?

### Parameters

Name | Type | Default | Description
---- | ---- | ------- | -----------
`value` | number |  |The value to test.
`other` | number |  |The other value to compare to.
`precision` | number |  |The precision of the comparision.


### Description

The value to test.
